title: Angular velocity of a rotating platform

content.question: A rotating platform with a radius of <math alttext="2.0 meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2.0</mn><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> makes one complete turn every <math alttext="3.0 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>3.0</mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext> s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>. The angular velocity of the platform is most nearly

choices.label: <math alttext="2.1 radians per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2.1</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>rad</mtext><mo>/</mo><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="1.5 radians per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.5</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>rad</mtext><mo>/</mo><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="1.0 radians per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>rad</mtext><mo>/</mo><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="0.70 radian per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.70</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>rad</mtext><mo>/</mo><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="0.30 radian per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.30</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>rad</mtext><mo>/</mo><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="2.1 radians per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2.1</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>rad</mtext><mo>/</mo><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
